name: Bitsy ZX Spectrum Game: Fido! Where's your bone?
name_original: Bitsy ZX Spectrum Game: Fido! Where's your bone?
description: You're living your best life as the lovable labrador Fido. However, disaster has struck. You've lost your bone while you were outside playing! Now you have to find it, but remember to be a good boy and keep off of the streets!
